verbose_text: CTGF is regulated by TGF-beta1 in other systems and in pigs, CTGF expression is highly correlated with that of TGF-beta1 in uterine tissues, indicating that CTGF may mediate some of the functions of TGF-beta1 in the reproductive tract during the oestrous cycle and pregnancy, such as stromal remodelling and angiogenesis.
evidence: CTGF may mediate some of the functions of TGF-beta1
